overview: Zenon Ziembiewicz, after finishing University in Paris, meets Elizabeth, whom he was in love with at an earlier age. He also meets Justine at a family farm, not realizing she will have a profound effect on his life. When he comes back to the city, he falls in love with Elizabeth, and all goes well, until one day when Justine pays him a visit with some shocking news
title: The Border - Granica
